CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Research}.

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starburst College}.

VE.A: Luminara Academy's publication count in 1979 is {159.70} papers.

VE.A: Luminara Academy's publication count is {159.70} papers, Oracle Labs's publication count is {86.41} papers, Starburst College's publication count is {77.92} papers.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Publication Count go below 470 papers? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {463.82} papers in {1971}, total value was {370.25} papers in {1966}, total value was {402.46} papers in {1970}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Publication Count exceed 631 papers? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Publication Count fall between 523 and 578 papers? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {536.15} papers in {1973}, total value was {550.56} papers in {1972}.

NC.A: The average total publication count between {1974} and {1981} was {lower} than between {1977} and {1978}.
